mapper.select: select bti.*,bs.sampleNum,bh.checkeds,bs.sort from barn_test_item bti LEFT JOIN barn_sample bs ON bti.sampleId = bs.id LEFT JOIN barn_handover bh ON FIND_IN_SET(bs.id,bh.sampleIds) where bti.sampleId = #{sampleId}

select bti.*,bs.sampleNum,bh.checkeds from barn_test_item bti LEFT JOIN barn_sample bs ON bs.id = bti.sampleId LEFT JOIN barn_handover bh ON FIND_IN_SET(bs.id,bh.sampleIds) GROUP BY bs.`sampleNum`
ORDER BY createTime desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select COUNT(DISTINCT bti.sampleId) as counts from barn_test_item bti LEFT JOIN barn_sample bs ON bti.sampleId = bs.id

SELECT bs.*,bt.taskName FROM barn_test_item bti LEFT JOIN barn_sample bs ON bti.sampleId = bs.id LEFT JOIN barn_task bt ON bs.taskId = bt.id LEFT JOIN barn_handover bh ON FIND_IN_SET(bs.id,bh.sampleIds) WHERE FLOOR(bti.testItem) = FLOOR(#{testItem})

SELECT DISTINCT bs.*, bt.taskName FROM barn_sample bs LEFT JOIN barn_task bt ON bs.taskId = bt.id LEFT JOIN barn_handover bh ON FIND_IN_SET(bs.id, bh.sampleIds) WHERE bs.sort = #{sort} AND FIND_IN_SET(FLOOR(#{testItem}), bh.checkeds)
